summary: Provides a Linux‑only Python interface that launches an ANSYS MAPDL shell via pexpect, manages its lifecycle, sends commands, performs meshing actions, and retrieves session information for versions up to 17.0.
business_intent: Enable automated, script‑driven execution of ANSYS MAPDL simulations on legacy Linux systems, allowing engineers to integrate finite element analysis into batch workflows and custom applications without manual GUI interaction.
